channel.title: brew on Even - A super concise theme for Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in brew on Even - A super concise theme for Hugo

item.title: brew-update
item.description: brew更新软件时常用的操作 安装 brew ruby -e "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.github.com/Homebrew/homebrew/Go/install)" 搜索 brew search MySQL 查看程序具体信息 brew info mysql 更新 brew brew update 更新软件 brew upgrade mysql 如果不指定更新哪个则会更新所有可以更新的
